extends java.lang.Object
    Ensures compatibility with older and newer versions of the API. See the SDK docs for comments This file was adapted from Mixare

    Daniele Gobbetti , Justin Wetherell

      • getSupportedPreviewSizes

        public static java.util.List<Camera.Size> getSupportedPreviewSizes(Camera.Parameters params)
        If it's running on a new phone, let's get the supported preview sizes, before it was fixed to 480 x 320
        Parameters:
        params - Camera's parameters.
        Returns:
        List of supported Camera viewer sizes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if supported size fails.
